verses.text: Additionally, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* set apart some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asaph, \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* accompaniment \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*, \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*. \w The|strong="H1961"\w* following \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w list|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w performed|strong="H4399"\w* \w this|strong="H1732"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w*:

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w seer|strong="H2374"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w promises|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w* \w fourteen|strong="H6240"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w direction|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w music|strong="H7892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
